wikipedia_page.main: Arnold "Arnie" Morgan  (born 19 September 1942) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1960s and 1970s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, England and Yorkshire, and at club level for Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 426) and York, as an occasional goal-kicking prop or second-row, i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12, during the era of contested scrums.
